issue.title: [CF 1067] Overview page,
issue.body:
I miss an way to check while /tmw is active, what icon is actually appearing in a meta icon. this would be incredibly handy for troubleshooting. Are there currently any way to do this?

Also a overview page of conditions on an icon would be nice. A page where you cant do anything but you can easily read over what conditions, animations etc apply to this icon.


> Posted by CurseForge user shisagi | Imported from CurseForge issue #1067 | Raw

comments.body:
If you have several icons that use the same texture, you can give some of them a custom texture if you want to distinguish between them while troubleshooting.

The overview thing sounds very redundant. There are only 3 tabs that configure icons, and they all present their information quite plainly. The only things that isn't immediately accessible are Unit Conditions/ Notification trigger conditions, and those only need one extra button press.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
